Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: Throw piercing hammers at nearby enemies.

levels.1: Throws 1 hammer every 2 seconds dealing 8 damage. Piercing 2.
levels.2: Throws 1 hammer every 2 seconds dealing 12 damage. Piercing 2.
levels.3: Throws 2 hammers every 2 seconds dealing 12 damage. Piercing 2.
levels.4: Throws 2 hammers every 2 seconds dealing 15 damage. Piercing 3.
levels.5: Throws 2 hammers every 1.5 seconds dealing 15 damage. Piercing 4.

levels.1: Drops 1 anvil every 3 seconds dealing 10 damage in the area.
levels.2: Drops 1 anvil every 3 seconds dealing 14 damage in the area.
levels.3: Drops 2 anvils every 3 seconds dealing 14 damage in the area.
levels.4: Drops 2 anvils every 3 seconds dealing 20 damage in the area.
levels.5: Drops 3 anvils every 2 seconds dealing 20 damage in the area.

Pen.name: Pen
Pen.description: Throw lot's of weak pens at nearby enemies.

levels.1: Throws 1 pen every 0.5 seconds dealing 2 damage.
levels.2: Throws 1 pen every 0.5 seconds dealing 4 damage.
levels.3: Throws 2 pens every 0.5 seconds dealing 4 damage.
levels.4: Throws 2 pens every 0.5 seconds dealing 6 damage.
levels.5: Throws 3 pens every 0.4 seconds dealing 6 damage.

Lightbulb.name: Lightbulb
Lightbulb.description: Stun enemies in an area around you.

levels.1: Flashes light every 5 seconds around you dealing 5 damage and stunning for 1 second.
levels.2: Flashes light every 5 seconds around you dealing 6 damage and stunning for 1 second.
levels.3: Flashes light every 5 seconds around you dealing 6 damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds.
levels.4: Flashes light every 4 seconds around you dealing 6 damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds.
levels.5: Flashes light every 4 seconds around you dealing 8 damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

Smoke Mask.name: Smoke Mask
Smoke Mask.description: Deal constant damage in an area around you.

levels.1: Emmits smoke every 2 seconds around you dealing 2 damage.
levels.2: Emmits smoke every 2 seconds around you dealing 3 damage.
levels.3: Emmits smoke every 1.5 seconds around you dealing 3 damage.
levels.4: Emmits smoke every 1 second around you dealing 4 damage.
levels.5: Emmits smoke every 1 second around you dealing 5 damage. Increase area by 50%.

Discus.name: Discus
Discus.description: Throw discs that bounce between enemies.

levels.1: Throws 1 disc every 3 seconds dealing 5 damage. It bounces 2 times.
levels.2: Throws 1 disc every 3 seconds dealing 8 damage. It bounces 2 times.
levels.3: Throws 1 disc every 2 seconds dealing 8 damage. It bounces 2 times.
levels.4: Throws 1 disc every 2 seconds dealing 10 damage. It bounces 3 times.
levels.5: Throws 2 discs every 2 seconds dealing 10 damage. They bounce 4 times.

Code Civil.name: Code Civil
Code Civil.description: Throw books that deal more damage the further they travel.

levels.1: Throws 1 book every 3 seconds dealing 3-30 damage, depending on the distance.
levels.2: Throws 1 book every 3 seconds dealing 4-40 damage, depending on the distance.
levels.3: Throws 1 book every 2.5 seconds dealing 5-50 damage, depending on the distance.
levels.4: Throws 1 book every 2 seconds dealing 6-60 damage, depending on the distance.
levels.5: Throws 2 books every 2 seconds dealing 8-80 damage, depending on the distance.

Divider.name: Divider
Divider.description: Throw piercing dividers that come back to you.

levels.1: Throws 1 divider every 2 seconds dealing 5 damage. Piercing 3.
levels.2: Throws 1 divider every 2 seconds dealing 7 damage. Piercing 3.
levels.3: Throws 2 dividers every 2 seconds dealing 7 damage. Piercing 3.
levels.4: Throws 2 dividers every 2 seconds dealing 8 damage. Piercing 4.
levels.5: Throws 2 dividers every 2 seconds dealing 10 damage. Piercing 6.

levels.1: Leave an area of needles every 5 units that deal 5 damage.
levels.2: Leave an area of needles every 4 units that deal 6 damage.
levels.3: Leave an area of needles every 4 units that deal 8 damage.
levels.4: Leave an area of needles every 3 units that deal 8 damage.
levels.5: Leave an area of needles every 2 units that deal 10 damage.

levels.1: Throws 1 chisel every 2 seconds dealing 15 damage.
levels.2: Throws 1 chisel every 2 seconds dealing 25 damage.
levels.3: Throws 2 chisels every 2 seconds dealing 25 damage.
levels.4: Throws 2 chisels every 2 seconds dealing 35 damage.
levels.5: Throws 2 chisels every 1.5 seconds dealing 40 damage.

Safety Boots.name: Safety Boots
Safety Boots.description: Take less damage from melee attacks.

levels.1: Heal 1% of your maximum health every 2 seconds.
levels.2: Heal 2% of your maximum health every 2 seconds.
levels.3: Heal 3% of your maximum health every 2 seconds.
levels.4: Heal 5% of your maximum health every 2 seconds.
levels.5: Heal 5% of your maximum health every 1 second.

Toolbelt.name: Toolbelt
Toolbelt.description: Every equipped weapon increases your damage.

Razor.name: Razor
Razor.description: Taking damage increases your attack speed for that room (permanent at level 5).

levels.1: +1% attack speed every time you take damage (resets each room).
levels.2: +2% attack speed every time you take damage (resets each room).
levels.3: +3% attack speed every time you take damage (resets each room).
levels.4: +5% attack speed every time you take damage (resets each room).
levels.5: +1% permanent attack speed every time you take damage.

Binder.name: Binder
Binder.description: Increases damage to bosses and elites.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: Drastically increases maximum health but start each room injured.

levels.1: +20 maximum health but start each room with 90% health.
levels.2: +40 maximum health but start each room with 75% health.
levels.3: +75 maximum health but start each room with 50% health.
levels.4: +100 maximum health but start each room with 25% health.
levels.5: +150 maximum health but start each room with 25% health.

Stethoscope.name: Stethoscope
Stethoscope.description: Healing increases your damage for that room (permanent at level 5).

levels.1: +1% damage every time you heal (resets each room).
levels.2: +2% damage every time you heal (resets each room).
levels.3: +3% damage every time you heal (resets each room).
levels.4: +5% damage every time you heal (resets each room).
levels.5: +1% permanent damage every time you heal.

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.description: Regenerates your health everytime an enemy spawns.

levels.1: +0.5 health for every enemy that spawns.
levels.2: +1 health for every enemy that spawns.
levels.3: +2 health for every enemy that spawns.
levels.4: +3 health for every enemy that spawns.
levels.5: +5 health for every enemy that spawns.

3D Printer.name: 3D Printer
3D Printer.description: Chance to copy another random card effect every room.

levels.1: 10% chance to copy another random card effect (resets each room).
levels.2: 25% chance to copy another random card effect (resets each room).
levels.3: 40% chance to copy another random card effect (resets each room).
levels.4: 60% chance to copy another random card effect (resets each room).
levels.5: 100% chance to copy another random card effect (resets each room).

Ear Protection.name: Ear Protection
Ear Protection.description: Increases your duration of invincibility after taking damage.

levels.1: +25% duration of invincibility after taking damage.
levels.2: +50% duration of invincibility after taking damage.
levels.3: +75% duration of invincibility after taking damage.
levels.4: +100% duration of invincibility after taking damage.
levels.5: +150% duration of invincibility after taking damage.

Newspaper.name: Newspaper
Newspaper.description: Drastically increases your movement speed, but decreases your damage while standing still.

levels.1: +5% movement speed, -5% damage while standing still.
levels.2: +10% movement speed, -10% damage while standing still.
levels.3: +15% movement speed, -15% damage while standing still.
levels.4: +25% movement speed, -25% damage while standing still.
levels.5: +50% movement speed, -25% damage while standing still.

Screwdriver.name: Screwdriver
Screwdriver.description: Killing an enemy increases your attack speed for that room (permanent at level 5).

levels.1: +1% attack speed every time you kill an enemy (resets each room).
levels.2: +2% attack speed every time you kill an enemy (resets each room).
levels.3: +3% attack speed every time you kill an enemy (resets each room).
levels.4: +5% attack speed every time you kill an enemy (resets each room).
levels.5: +1% permanent attack speed every time you kill an enemy.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: Negates the first damage taken per room.

levels.1: Negates the first 1 instance of damage per room.
levels.2: Negates the first 2 instances of damage per room.
levels.3: Negates the first 3 instances of damage per room.
levels.4: Negates the first 4 instances of damage per room.
levels.5: Negates the next 4 instances of damage every new room (stays inbetween rooms).

Riot Shield.name: Riot Shield
Riot Shield.description: Chance to shoot projectiles back when hit.

Piercing Gun.name: Piercing Gun
Piercing Gun.description: Increases your piercing effect of projectiles.

Stopwatch.name: Stopwatch
Stopwatch.description: Stuns random enemies when taking damage.

levels.1: Stuns 1 random enemy for 1 second everytime you take damage.
levels.2: Stuns 2 random enemies for 1 second everytime you take damage.
levels.3: Stuns 3 random enemies for 1.5 seconds everytime you take damage.
levels.4: Stuns 4 random enemies for 1.5 seconds everytime you take damage.
levels.5: Stuns 5 random enemies for 2 seconds everytime you take damage.

levels.1: Heal 1% of the damage you deal.
levels.2: Heal 2% of the damage you deal.
levels.3: Heal 5% of the damage you deal.
levels.4: Heal 15% of the damage you deal.
levels.5: Heal 30% of the damage you deal.

Shredder.name: Shredder
Shredder.description: Deal and receive drastically more damage.

Whiteboard.name: Whiteboard
Whiteboard.description: Reduces your stats, but increases them per level on your equipped cards.

levels.1: -30% all stats, +1% all stats per level on your equipped cards.
levels.2: -20% all stats, +1% all stats per level on your equipped cards.
levels.3: -60% all stats, +2% all stats per level on your equipped cards.
levels.4: -40% all stats, +2% all stats per level on your equipped cards.
levels.5: -90% all stats, +3% all stats per level on your equipped cards.

Drawing Tablet.name: Drawing Tablet
Drawing Tablet.description: Increases the amount of your projectiles.

Press Vest.name: Press Vest
Press Vest.description: Increases your damage resistance the faster you are.

levels.1: +1% Damage resistance per current movement speed (maximum 60%).
levels.2: +2% Damage resistance per current movement speed (maximum 65%).
levels.3: +3% Damage resistance per current movement speed (maximum 70%).
levels.4: +5% Damage resistance per current movement speed (maximum 75%).
levels.5: +8% Damage resistance per current movement speed (maximum 90%).

Tong.name: Tong
Tong.description: Drastically increase your attack speed while standing still.

High-Vis West.name: High-Vis West
High-Vis West.description: Chance to deal received damage back to enemies.

levels.1: 20% chance to deal received damage back to enemies.
levels.2: 30% chance to deal received damage back to enemies.
levels.3: 40% chance to deal received damage back to enemies.
levels.4: 60% chance to deal received damage back to enemies.
levels.5: 100% chance to deal received damage back to enemies.

Diploma.name: Diploma
Diploma.description: Drastically decreases your stats, but boosterpacks drop randomly.

levels.1: -50% on all stats, but every cleared room has a 10% chance to drop a booster pack (+10% per cleared room).

Internship.name: Internship
Internship.description: Counts one towards every job set.

levels.1: Every job gets +1 for their set.
Rerolls every outcome twice and takes the better option.
